text: Karataş is a light-rail station on the Konak Tram of the Tram İzmir system in İzmir, Turkey. It is located along the Mustafa Kemal Coastal Boulevard in Karataş, Konak. The station consists of two side platforms serving two tracks. Karataş station opened on 24 March 2018. ==Connections== ESHOT operates city bus service on İnönü Avenue. {| class="toccolours" border="1" cellpadding="3" style="border-collapse:collapse" |+ ESHOT Bus service |- style="background:lightblue;" !Route Number !Stop !Route !Location |- |10 |Asansör |Üçkuyular İskele — Konak |Mustafa Kemal Sahil Boulevard |- |12 |Asansör |F.
